titles.ar: باب أَنَّ النِّسَاءَ يُصَدَّقْنَ فِي الْعِدَّةِ وَ الْحَيْضِ
titles.en: Chapter 34 – The women are ratified with regards to the waiting period and the menstruation

titles.ar: باب أَنَّ النِّسَاءَ يُصَدَّقْنَ فِي الْعِدَّةِ وَ الْحَيْضِ
titles.en: Chapter 34 – The women are ratified with regards to the waiting period and the menstruation

text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ جَمِيلٍ عَنْ زُرَارَةَ عَنْ أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ الْعِدَّةُ وَ الْحَيْضُ لِلنِّسَاءِ إِذَا ادَّعَتْ صُدِّقَتْ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Jameel, from Zurara,
(It has been narrated) from Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘The waiting period, and the menstruation are for the women; when they claim, they would be ratified’.
